EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Follow up to today's voicemail (1560538180.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Follow up to today's voicemail (1560538180.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Jason,
I hope all is well. Thank you for your voicemail. I tried calling back twice but the automated attendant did not come on. I can certainly assist here. Since January we have had a paper price increase. I will see what I can do since you're purchasing a skid at a time. When will you need the paper? I will need a week or so to confirm. As for the custom stamps email me what you need and I can get a quote done for you. Thank you again and have a good afternoon.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom| Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
